pages.text: The $(mob)Stymphalian Bird$() is a monster found in $(thing)Swamps$(). It flies around alongside its flock, attacking players and animals on sight with a barrage of deadly feathers.$(p)Killing a single bird in a flock causes the rest to flee the killer.
$(mob)Stymphalian Birds$() drop $(item)Stymphalian Bird Feathers$() on death, and sometimes when on a feather projectile's impact. They can be crafted into powerful $(item)Stymphalian Arrows$().
